Description of incident: Bulk Reef Supply notified customers of a data breach when their online website was compromised. The customer information compromised included names, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, usernames, passwords, and credit card information. The company is asking customers to change their passwords. The company is offering one year free of credit monitoring and identity theft services. More Information: http://www.scmagazine.com/bulk-reef-supply-website-compromised-credit-ca...
